content: Loans Property Asked by AnonymousAsked on 03 Apr 2019Which loan should I choose for BTO? I have been employed for a year and earn approx 40k annually, 30k savings, 3-4k in OA. I have around 1k in robo advisors and p2p too. My partner is in final year of uni and will be job hunting soon but around 1/2 of their salary will go to family due to retired parents.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 03 Apr 2019Pick HDB loan for safety and peace of mind. Bank loan rates are starting to go up. HDB is generally more lenient and can appeal if you miss payment. Banks are not so merciful, their objective is profit.0 comments0
